name: Awakening (itch) (Britney Luong)
description:
A little girl named Lily is having trouble waking up from her nightmare. Help her find a way out of this nightmare!

Lily will do her best following a trail of blue crystals that will lead her out of her nightmare, but you must prevent her from running into obstacles, especially the skeletons! Lily's dreams are full of multi-colored crystals, and you should use them to your advantage to prevent Lily from getting hurt!

Features:

- Different colored crystals with different mechanics including teleportation

- Creepy skeletons that you must avoid at all costs

- Progressive environments with nightmarish and surrealistic atmospheres

- A cute little girl that you must protect!

All assets are from SineVFX, Runemark Studio, 3LE Studios, Arkham Interactive, Fabio di Santo, Poligons Sounds, Grumble Labs, Idia Software, BBSoftware & Snowball Ent., and TeamJoker!
